CheckTitle: Check if ACM Certificates use a secure RSA key size
Description: Check if ACM Certificates use a secure RSA key size
Risk: Certificates with weak RSA keys can be compromised.

Recommendation.Text: Ensure that all ACM certificates use RSA keys of at least 2048 bits. If any certificates use smaller keys, regenerate them with a secure key size and update any systems that rely on these certificates.
